_sText:
This map is a "double" remake. HAVONAR created a called map CS_RIO_CSS, based on the old map CS_RIO for CS 1.6, that it was built by MATALEONE... But cs_rio_css was build VERY different, seeming a desert, not at all remembering a shanty-town. I improved and I repaired many mistakes that the map Cs_rio_css had, and now he is approximated of the original of MATALEONE, remembering a shanty-town, with original map songs (however some differences stay).

Author HAVONAR'S e-mail is: havonar at hotmail.com

Any suggestion to FINAL version please mail me at: games_developer at pop.com.br 

http://site.pop.com.br/games_developer
